subject: College Athletics
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Wayne Ellington made a 3-pointer with 0.4 seconds left in overtime to lift top-ranked North Carolina to a 90-88 victory at No. 19 Clemson on Sunday night.
snippet: Wayne Ellington made a 3-pointer with 0.4 seconds left in overtime to lift top-ranked North Carolina to a 90-88 victory at No. 19 Clemson on Sunday night.
